articles.content: New Delhi: U23 World Champion Aman Sehrawat and World Championships silver medalist Deepak Punia secured their berth for the upcoming Asian Games after winning the wrestling trials at the Indira Gand… [+1606 chars]

articles.title: Hyderabad FC sign Pennanen; Rane joins Mumbai City FC on loan; Muirang leaves Bengaluru FC - Indian Super League
articles.description: Hero Indian Super League (ISL) side Hyderabad FC announced the signing of Finnish midfielder Petteri Pennanen on Sunday through their social media handle
articles.content:
Hero Indian Super League (ISL) side Hyderabad FC announced the signing of Finnish midfielder Petteri Pennanen on Sunday through their social media handle.
